titles.title: A resolution recognizing and commending the members of the Navy and Marine Corps who served in the U.S.S. Abraham Lincoln and welcoming them home from their recent mission abroad.
A resolution recognizing and commending the members of the Navy and Marine Corps who served in the U.S.S. Abraham Lincoln and welcoming them home from their recent mission abroad.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Commends the members of the Navy and Marine Corps who serve on the USS Abraham Lincoln (a Nimitz-class nuclear-powered aircraft carrier based at Naval Station Everett in Washington) and welcomes them home from their recent mission abroad (a deployment of nearly ten months in support of Operations Iraqi Freedom, Enduring Freedom, and Southern Watch).
